Home Collections Gallery Contact

About Us

MAEKNIT revolutionizes knitwear development for fashion brands, enabling faster, more sustainable collections with minimal upfront risk. Founded by Mallory Epping, Naeem Riaz, Elias Brown, & Kadri Sen. MAEKNIT eliminates inefficiencies like high minimum order quantities (MOQs) and excessive lead times globally, delivering a responsive, waste-free production process. With cutting-edge technology and sustainable practices, we empower brands to launch trend-responsive collections while minimizing environmental impact. Imagine a service where you can get what you want when you want from where you want. Thatâ€™s it MAEKNIT.

Our Commitment

We blend innovation with craftsmanship, integrating new technologies and traditional techniques with a focus on sustainability and social impact.

Our Expertise

  • Sketching, illustration, and flat rendering
  • Draping, pattern-making, and mock-ups
  • Research, concept development, and mood board creation
  • Trend forecasting and artisanal specialization
  • Production-level technical specifications
  • Material sourcing and in-house testing
  • Special projects and mixed media endeavors

Our Collaborations

We collaborate with leading manufacturers worldwide, ensuring quality and precision at every step.

); } export default About;
